mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tip_reply (tr_no, t_no, tr_content, id) values (tip_reply_seq.nextval, #{t_no}, #{tr_content}, #{id})
mapper.update: update tbl_tip_reply set tr_content = #{tr_content}, tr_updatetime = sysdate where tr_no = #{tr_no}
mapper.select: select count(tr_no) from tbl_tip_reply where t_no = #{t_no}
